local_intent: Execute pinch grasp on the grape using the stored grasp pose and verify stability.
assumptions: The grape is still visible at grasp time.
Blackboard key 'grasp_grape' was produced earlier by ComputeGraspPose and validated by PoseAvailable.
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence after detection and pose computation: align to grape, perform Pick(grasp_grape,1200), then confirm IsGraspStable; retreat occurs in the parent tree.
